meta.title: Vert.x Web API Service Introduction
meta.summary: This blog post teaches you how to use the new module vertx-web-api-service to combine the Web Router and the OpenAPI Router Factory with service proxies.

meta.title: HTTP response validation with the Vert.x Web Client
meta.summary: Learn how to use response predicates from the Vert.x Web module to validate HTTP responses and to automatically generate error messages.

meta.title: The RSS reader tutorial (Step 3)
meta.summary: This is the third installment of our Vert.x Cassandra Client tutorial. We will implement the last RSS endpoint serving a list of articles related to a specific channel.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.6.0 released!
meta.summary: We are pleased to announce the Eclipse Vert.x 3.6.0 release.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.5.4
meta.summary: We have just released Vert.x 3.5.4, a bug fix release of Vert.x 3.5.x.

meta.title: The RSS reader tutorial (Step 2)
meta.summary: In this second installment of our Vert.x Cassandra Client tutorial, we will add an endpoint that produces an array of RSS channels for a given user ID.
